reviews.review: Muy bueno, la verdad. De mis juegos favoritos.
Отличный разгон для начала игры во вторую часть. А так, на сегодняшний момент пресновато. игра проходится только для того что бы узнать предысторию Portal 2. 8.5 кубов компаньонов/10

um dos melhores jogos de puzzles.

[spoiler] The Cake is a Lie [/spoiler]

its ok the some of the puzzles ar great and some arent ur going to see the same puzzles often while playing the game also i didnt finish the game i reached the last level and every time i die the game crashes so theres alot of technical issues i give a 5/10 just dont expect much but im hoping portal 2 is gonna fix all the proplems

El juego es divertido y bueno pero tiene varios problemas como la corta duracion de la historia (En mi caso 4hs la historia) 
Hablando en detalles:
Precio: el juego vale 129,99 (lo compre en halloween a 25,99) 
Historia: es corta como dije pero muy divertida y muy buena 
Modalidad: muy buena es un juego de plataforma donde tiene puzzles muy buenos y justos 
En mi recomendacion RECOMENDABLE aunque es mi opinion solo queda que lo pruebes tu

Начала всех начал так скажем, как эксперимент, - удавшийся, как игра с глубоким сюжетом (не учитывая второю часть и остального лора, что нужно специально узнавать) - такое себе.
А вообще игра огонь, и физика, и геймплей, и графон (для тех времен).

Simple and fun, and just a little challenging at times. I really liked it. It can feel outdated but not enough to bother me at all or take away from the main focus, the puzzles. Iconic game that everyone should play unless they despise puzzle games.

Still an amazing game, even after 13 years. The puzzles stay fun and the source engine's physics remain fantastic. But what shines most of all in Portal is it's oppresive atmosphere. The game makes you feel truly alone in the test chambers, and even more so in the latter half of the game. The bonus maps also make a fine addition and add more replayability and challenge to an already amazing game.

[h1] A game that you just need to play! [/h1] 

Portal 1 is such a lovely game, with all those details!
If you haven't played it yet, you need to buy it! 
You need to!

And remember, the cake is a lie!

Btw the game doesn't support audio above 192000 Hz

Good puzzles, nostalgia. That doesn't help you if you haven't played it, but let's face it, you're a person that owns steam, so you probably have. It's a damn good game, but it's dwarfed by it's sequel.

My favorite game. I love coming back to it every few years, the chambers are still fun and the writing on the game is still incredible. The end title music makes this one of the few games where I actually watch the credits.
If  you have never played this game, then I strongly recommend you get it. I don't think you will regret it.

Pretty short game and not much story to it, but it has some pretty fun puzzles and mechanics that makes it definitely worth a try and the lore to it is pretty interesting with what little story there is.

[b] Highly recommend buying this on a sale though [/b]
With how short the game was, I felt the [b] 10 dollar [/b] was a bit much for something so short. But that's probably just me.

In any case if this doesn't sound too appealing, then I suggest directing your wallets over to the sequel, portal 2, for more story, puzzles, challenges, and even co-op as well and giving that game a try.
This is an awesome game.

I absolutely love Portal. A classic in it's own right and although the main game loses it's appeal through multiple play-throughs, the challenge rooms are still a difficult subject all around. A treat of a game, just like the oh so promised cake. 10/10 would wholeheartedly recommend to any gamer or puzzler alike. Plus, the PC version offers better graphics and frame-rates than the original included in The Orange Box on any of the platforms it first released on.

Must have per PC, PORTAL è un esperienza più unica che rara! Formula rompicapo mai banale o frustrante, finito in meno di 3 ore! Soddisfatto di questo gioco e lo consiglio vivamente perchè (a parte il secondo capitolo) non si trovano esperienze simili! Ovviamente ora proverò il 2 e vi farò sapere xD

Надо ли представлять эту игру? Очень в этом сомневаюсь. Данная игра, это один из самых лучших проектов, что появлялся на просторах геймдева. Да она короткая, но зато сколько к ней уже сделано бонусных карт! Просто уму непостижимо. На дворе уже 2020 год, прошло уже 13 лет с выхода игры, а она всё ещё актуальна. Проверку временем прошла однозначно!
Игра которую не только можно порекомендовать всем, но и нужно, от мала до велика. Крайне рекомендую, если вы ещё по каким-то причинам не сыграли в неё. Очень интересные головоломки, развивающие пространственное мышление, вкупе с хорошим юмором.

If you haven't played the game then it's a must play. This is far more than a puzzle game. It has an amazing story to go alone with it that you slowly put together over the course of the game and it's amazing for being able to not just pull off an amazing puzzle game with interesting and fun puzzles but it's another thing to be able to put together an amazing story along side all of that. A must finish for every gamer, even if you don't like puzzle games.

I've beaten Portal 2 a long time ago but I've never played Portal 1. I saw both were on sale together for $3 so I figured this would be a great opportunity to finally play it. Boy was I blown away. Though the game is very short (I beat it in around 2 hours), I was shocked with how involved I became in the story. Gameplay difficulty consistently increases and the story becomes more eerie as you understand what is going on. If you never gave Portal a chance I highly recommend it!
Portal is an amazing classic. With the fun story mode to the advanced maps to put your skills up to the test, the portal series is one of my favorite game series.
